description: This is a Flutter widget class named HomeScreen, representing the main UI for a mobile application’s home screen. It builds a scaffold with an app bar and a list of service options in the body.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A Flutter widget class that displays the home screen with an app bar and a list of service options.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI of the HomeScreen widget, returning a Scaffold with an AppBar and a ListView of service options.
